title: HTTP Client Hints
body: Header for proactive content negotiation; just as the Accept header allowed clients to indicate what formats they prefer, Client Hints allow clients to indicate a list of device and agent specific preferences.

comments.body: This is an important feature that complete srcsets and sizes html tags for automating perfect pixel sized images for any kind of device, past or future, easily, and without any javascript or lazy loading javascript horrific codes. Pure HTML/HTTP, and can help to reduce global bandwidth usage for faster websites.
Having the accept attribute makes form validation much easier for developers.  This should supported immediately.
This is gaining steam, imgix has rolled out server support out and the Thumbor team is probably going to do the same pretty soon.
